name: null_value_variants
description: Tests detection of inconsistent null value representations
notes: Tests various null representations: NA, N/A, null, NULL, missing, empty, -, not available
Current detection: completeness issues and 'unknown' pattern in diagnosis
FUTURE: Should detect inconsistent null value usage within columns
FUTURE: NCBI prefers specific null terms: 'not collected', 'not applicable', 'missing'
